answers.answer: I haven't been through what you have. My sister has lupus as well, but never had kids. What does your doctor say about it? I am assuming your symptoms are in remission with the pregnancy. I am guessing you can only do the best you can with your diet and exercise. Good luck!

Yes. My Lupus Is In Remission During Pregnancy. With This Being My Third Though I'm Scared That Something May Happen. I Am Careful To Avoid Stressful Situations And I Watch What I Eat. I Guess The Fear Of Not Knowing What May Happen Is My Biggest Problem. Especially With Bring High Risk.

question: I'm 30 Years Old. I Was Diagnosed With Lupus At 21.  i Am PregnanT With My 3Rd NOw.  At 24, My Oldest Born Via Emergency C-Section, Was 5 Weeks Early At 3Lbs 3Oz.  All Was Fine With Him. I Developed PreEclampsia With HELLP Syndrome.  At 27, My Second Was Perfect. No Complications In Any Way. She Was Born Via Scheduled C-Section 1 Week Early At 5Lbs 11Oz. All Was Well Her Also.  Now Being 30, I'm Afraid That I Will Have More Complications Due To The High Risk Category I Was.Placed Into At 21. My Questions...Has Anyone Been Through Anything Similar? What Should I Expect? Any Suggestions As To How I Can Ensure A Healthy Full Term Pregnancy?
title: curious and scared
